name: Cute Fat Animals - Critter Color Pop Chain Puzzle Game FREE
name_original: Cute Fat Animals - Critter Color Pop Chain Puzzle Game FREE
description:
*** This Game has NO ADS!***

Get ready for the cutest, fattest, animal puzzle game yet! Drag your finger to connect the same colored animals in any direction to link them together. Connect big chains to score crazy combos with colorful bomb explosions! Try to pass all the levels on the map to win. Can you make it to the end?

Features:

-Over 50 levels
-Tons of bombs and crazy combinations
-Power up boosts to help you win
-Unique daily bonus game to score free gold and diamonds.
